item.description:
Time to get out of the apartment! Bar, lounge, pool tables, and dancing all in one spot! Hope to see everyone there.

The Plan: Meet around 8:30pm at Felt (533 Washington St near Boylston St). We will be at the bar downstairs until 10:30pm, and then head up stairs to the 4th Floor where there is a dance floor. Please try to meet us at the bar as the place can get crowded as the night goes on. Give me a call if you need help with directions or finding the group.

My picture is on this site (6ft tall Asian guy shouldn't be too hard to find). When you see the group, just introduce yourself and say you are a friend of Charlie. If your picture is up on the site, do RVSP and I'll look for you as well. My phone is 646.541.0708.

See you there! Charlie

*I do not expect a cover, but arrive early to be sure.*

For more information, see http://www.feltclubbo...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Enough of this Rain! Friday Night @ FELT
